Description: Papyrus. Demotic wisdom text verso (20 damaged lines of text). Torn at top and bottom and on both sides. Greek text recto.
Curator's comments: Bibliography Martin, C.J. 2016-2017. The Michaelides Demotic Material, Enchoria 35: 1-8.

Published by E. Bresciani, 'Testi demotici nella Collezione Michaelidis' (Oriens Antiquus 2; Rome, 1963), text I, pp. 1-4 and pl. i; republished by J.F. Quack, 'Fragmente demotischer Weisheitstexte', in F. Haikal (ed.), Melanges offerts a Ola el-Aguizy (BdE 164; Cairo, 2015), p. 339-343, 347.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (55910) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/55910)
